# <a name="adding-emojis-to-email-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="962a2-102">向电子邮件添加表情符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962a2-102">Adding emojis to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="962a2-103">您可以在邮件中插入表情符号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962a2-103">You can insert emojis in your messages.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="962a2-104">答复现有电子邮件或选择 " **新邮件**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962a2-104">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="962a2-105">选择 " **插入表情符号** " 按钮</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962a2-105">Select the **Insert emojis** button</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="962a2-106">在撰写窗口的底部，打开 "表达式" 窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962a2-106">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="962a2-107">搜索并选择要插入的表情符号或 GIF。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962a2-107">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>
